alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 09 at 3:59AM HST until January 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING UNTIL MONDAY MORNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU, KAUAI, OAHU, MOLOKAI, NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI, AND WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .The first in a series of northwest swells will peak this morning, then slowly lower through Monday. Two additional large northwest swells will arrive later this week. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Large, breaking surf, significant shorebreak, and dangerous currents make entering the water very hazardous.
